questions.question: What is the most amazing or beautiful robot that you've ever had the chance to work with?
What are your thoughts about Tesla autopilot or more generally vision-based machine learning approach to semi-autonomous driving?
When is the first fully autonomous train system for mass transit expected to operate fully autonomously?
What do you see when you go to a fully autonomous train in an airport?
Are you thinking 10 years from now, 20 years from now, 30 years from now?
What are you most proud of with that company and the approach you took to robotics?
Do you think this is almost like what it takes to build a successful robotics company?
Do you think it's possible to go from the ground up or is it just too much capital investment?
So can you clarify, force control is you can grab the arm and you can move it?
Does it hurt to think about an amazing company that didn't, like iRobot, didn't find a way?
Why you ever look up to the stars and ask, why the hell are we here?
